text: Paul Rogers (22 March 1917 - 6 October 2013) was an English movie and television actor who has appeared in movies such as; The Beachcomber, Our Man in Havana, Edwin, The Looking Glass War, and Billy Budd. Rogers was born on March 22, 1917 in Plympton, Devon, England. Rogers was educated at The Michael Chekhov Theatre Studio. Rogers was currently married to Rosalind Boxall. They two children. He lived in London, England. He has won a Tony Award. Rogers died on October 6, 2013 in his London, England home from natural causes, aged 96.Tony winner Paul Rogers dies ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1917 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Devon Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Paul Rogers
